CBUFF_SwSessionCfg_t Struct Reference

CBUFF Software Triggered Session configuration. More...

#include <drivers/cbuff/cbuff.h>

Data Fields

CBUFF_BufferCfg userBufferInfo [CBUFF_MAX_USER_BUFFER]
 User supplied data buffers which can be transmitted over the interface.
 

Detailed Description

CBUFF Software Triggered Session configuration.

The structure describes the configuration required to be specified if the session is created in software triggered mode.
